## PBTypeInfo.isCompatibleType() method

Check whether a given type is compatible with this type

**Signature:**

```typescript
isCompatibleType(other: PBTypeInfo): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  other | [PBTypeInfo](doc/markdown/./device.pbtypeinfo.md) | The type to be checked |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the given type is compatible with this type, othewise false
